summary: Three down-to-earth guys, record songs and reach out for alternatives to their ordinary lives.
cast: Oskar Cedermalm|Eddie Glass|Alfredo Hernandez|Pär Hjulström|Josh Homme|Carl Horne|Oscar Johansson|Winfred Kennerknecht|Niklas Källgren|Chris Maher|Peer Olejak|Nick Oliveri|Patrick Radtke|Ruben Romano|Andreas von Ahn
title: Truckfighters
